text: :Pages appear in :Category:Kenyan scientists This is a list of notable scientists from Kenya. ==K== *Kamoya Kimeu ==L== *Louis Leakey - archaeologist, anthropologist and naturalist; he died in 1972. *Louise Leakey - she is an paleontologist and anthropologist. ==M== *Wangari Maathai - she got a Nobel Peace Prize; environmentalist; died in 2011. ==O== *Barack Obama Sr., was a senior economic analyst in the Ministry of Finance; economist ==Related pages== *List of African scientists by country ==References== Kenyan *
title: List of Kenyan scientists
